text:
🌙 NEW FEATURES:
• Dark Mode Support - Switch between light and dark themes for better reading experience

🔧 IMPROVEMENTS:
• Enhanced app performance and stability
• Better user interface with theme support

🐛 BUG FIXES:
• Fixed various UI issues
• General bug fixes and optimizations
